comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050923-1000

I am not really sure what i was doing when i got this exception.  It is possible
that i had just closed the PDE perspective after creating a new plugin project.

Exception in thread "org.eclipse.jface.text.reconciler.MonoReconciler"
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
    at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3251)
    at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3174)
    at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3145)
    at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.error(Widget.java:407)
    at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.getDisplay(Widget.java:517)
    at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.SourceOutlinePage.reconciled(SourceOutlinePage.java:84)
    at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.text.ReconcilingStrategy.notifyParticipants(ReconcilingStrategy.java:50)
    at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.text.ReconcilingStrategy.reconcile(ReconcilingStrategy.java:45)
    at
org.eclipse.jface.text.reconciler.MonoReconciler.process(MonoReconciler.java:75)
    at
org.eclipse.jface.text.reconciler.AbstractReconciler$BackgroundThread.run(AbstractReconciler.java:204)

We were not checking if a control is disposed before refreshing the outline 
page. 

Fixed.
